named-query.name: User.byName
named-query.query: select u FROM User u WHERE lower(u.name)=:name

named-query.name: Entry.byGuids
named-query.query: select DISTINCT e from FeedEntry e JOIN FETCH e.feeds where e.guid in (:guids)

named-query.name: EntryStatus.byId
named-query.query: select s from FeedEntryStatus s where s.subscription.user=:user and s.id=:id

named-query.name: EntryStatus.unread
named-query.query: select s from FeedEntryStatus s where s.subscription.user=:user and s.read=false order by s.entry.updated desc

named-query.name: EntryStatus.all
named-query.query: select s from FeedEntryStatus s where s.subscription.user=:user order by s.entry.updated desc

named-query.name: EntryStatus.unreadByFeed
named-query.query: select s from FeedEntryStatus s where s.subscription.user=:user and s.subscription.feed=:feed and s.read=false order by s.entry.updated desc

named-query.name: EntryStatus.unreadCounts
named-query.query: select s.subscription.id, count(s) from FeedEntryStatus s where s.subscription.user=:user and s.read=false group by s.subscription.id

named-query.name: EntryStatus.allByFeed
named-query.query: select s from FeedEntryStatus s where s.subscription.user=:user and s.subscription.feed=:feed order by s.entry.updated desc

named-query.name: EntryStatus.unreadByCategories
named-query.query: select s from FeedEntryStatus s where s.subscription.user=:user and s.subscription.category in (:categories) and s.read=false order by s.entry.updated desc

named-query.name: EntryStatus.allByCategories
named-query.query: select s from FeedEntryStatus s where s.subscription.user=:user and s.subscription.category in (:categories) order by s.entry.updated desc

named-query.name: EntryStatus.allByKeywords
named-query.query: select s from FeedEntryStatus s where s.subscription.user=:user and (lower(s.entry.content) like :keywords or lower(s.entry.title) like :keywords) order by s.entry.updated desc
